results.name: Cross-Session Recall
results.description: Validates semantic recall of policy decisions across sessions with paraphrased queries

steps.description: Session 1 (Tuesday): User states language constraint with decision record ID and nonce

response.response:
Based on the provided Decision Record, the key points are:

1. The project team has decided to reject Python and use Java only for the integration project [#1].
2. This decision is final and should not be re-opened [#2].

fullResult.input: Decision Record ARCH-22B (Nonce N-19C8): We rejected Python for this integration project. We must use Java only. Do not re-open this decision.

observe.input: Decision Record ARCH-22B (Nonce N-19C8): We rejected Python for this integration project. We must use Java only. Do not re-open this decision.

steps.description: Session 2 (Friday): User asks about language choice, requesting decision record ID and nonce
